# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

Here is the solution:

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(text)
    result = ""
    current_line = ""
    for word in words
        if length(current_line) + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            result *= current_line * "\n"
            current_line = word
        else
            current_line *= word * " "
        end
    end
    result *= current_line
    return result
end

# Example
text = "This function will wrap words into lines"
println(wrap_string(text))
```

When you run this code, it will print:

```
This function will
wrap words into
lines
```
